Vaaran English.translation: One Oankar, the primal enegy, realised through The grace of divine preceptor.
Vaar Three
I bow before the primeval Lord who has been told as the primordial cause of all.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Awid purK' (gurU nwnk Xw prmySur) nUM nmskwr hovy jo (srb dw) Awid kwrx vKwx kIqw igAw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: so siqguru scw vysu; sbid is\wixAw [
lines.transliteration_english: so satigur sachaa ves; sabadh sin(y)aaNiaa |

Vaaran English.translation: Truth incarnate that true Guru is realised through the Word.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: EhI siqgurU s`cy rUp vwlw hY (ijs ny) sbd (duAwrw) pCwixAw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Only they have realised Him whose surati (consciousness) has merged into the truth after accepting the commands of the Word.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ijnHW ny) sbd surq dy aupdyS nwl (jgÎwsUAW nUM) sc smwieAw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Holy congregation is the genuine basis and authentic abode of truth.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: swD sMgq scw aupdyS hY, (EhI) Gr pRmwxIk hY;

Vaaran English.translation: Wherein the individual inspired by loving devotion enjoys the innate delight.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ij`Qy) pRymw BgqI ivKy pRvyS hY, Ar sihj suK pRwpq hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Lord, kind to the devotees and the glory of the poor, also assimilates Himself in the holy congregation.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Bgq vCl (Akwl purK ivKy ijnHW dw) prvyS (=smwvxw) hY (Eh) inmwixAW dy mwx huMdy hn (ijhw ik sRI gurU nwnk jI)[

lines.gurmukhi: bRhmw ibsnu mhys; AMqu n jwixAw [
lines.transliteration_english: brahamaa bisan mahes; ant na jaaNiaa |

Vaaran English.translation: Even Brahma, Visnu, Mahesa could not know His mysteries.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: bRhmw, ibSnu, iSv ny AMq nhIˆ pwieAw[

lines.gurmukhi: ismir sihj Px sysu; iqlu n pCwixAw [
lines.transliteration_english: simar sahij faN ses; til na pachhaaNiaa |

Vaaran English.translation: Sesanag remembering Him with its thousand hoods could not understand Him.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: SySnwg hzwr PnW vwlw (roz) ismrdw hY pr iql mwqR (AMq) nhIˆ jwxdw[

Vaaran English.translation: The truth is pleasing to those gurmukhs who have become dervish at the door of holy congregation.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (9) (jo) gurmuK 'dr' (siqsMg) dy drvyS hoey (aunHW nUM hI s`c) suhxw l`gw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: guru cyly rhrwis; AlKu AByau hY [

Vaaran English.translation: The ways of the Guru and the disciple are mysterious and imperceptible.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurU qy cyly dI (eykqw AQvw) rhurIqI AlK qy AByv hY[

lines.gurmukhi: guru cyly swbwis; nwnk dyau hY [
lines.transliteration_english: gur chele saabaas; naanak dheu hai |

Vaaran English.translation: Guru (Nanak) and disciple (Angad) both are blest (because both have merged into each other).

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurU qy cylw DMn hn (jo ieko) gurU nwnk dyau dw hI (rUp) hn[ (Bwv nwm do hn pr rUp ieko hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: Their abode is the wisdom of Guru and they both are rapt in the praises of the Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (gurU AMgd jI dw) gurU dI mq duAwrw invws sihj pd ivKy hY, (Aqy ausy dI) isPq ivKy smwey hoey hn[

lines.gurmukhi: sbid suriq prgws; ACl ACyau hY [
lines.transliteration_english: sabadh surat paragaas; achhal achheu hai |

Vaaran English.translation: Enlightened with the Word their consciousness has become infinite and immutable.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: sbd dy surq ivc prgws hox kr ky ACl ACyd (ho gey) hn[

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK Aws inrws; miq ArKyau hY [
lines.transliteration_english: guramukh aas niraas; mat arakheu hai |

Vaaran English.translation: Transcending all hopes they have assimilated subtle wisdom in their person.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Awsw Qoˆ inrws aucI mq (vwly) gurmuK hn (Bwv cVHdI klw ivc rihMdy hn)[

lines.gurmukhi: kwm kroD ivxwsu; isPiq smyau hY [
lines.transliteration_english: kaam karodh viNaas; sifat sameu hai |

Vaaran English.translation: Conquering the lust and anger they have absorbed themselves in the praises (of God).

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: kwm, kRoD Awid dw ABwv hY (qy vwihgurU dI) isPq ivc smwey rihMdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: sq sMqoK aulws; skiq n syau hY [
lines.transliteration_english: sat santokh aulaas; sakat na seu hai |

Vaaran English.translation: Beyond the abodes of Siva and Sakti they have reached the abode of truth, contentment and bliss.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: siq sMqoK dw AnMd hY (EQy) nW SkqI hY nw iSv hY[

lines.gurmukhi: Gr hI ivic audwsu; scu sucyau hY [
lines.transliteration_english: ghar hee vich audhaas; sach sucheu hai |

Vaaran English.translation: Being indifferent to household (pleasures) they are truth-oriented.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Gr hI ivKy (Bwv igRhsQ ivKy) audws qy (mnoˆ qnoˆ) s`cy qy su`cy hn[

lines.transliteration_english: veeh eikeeh abhiaas; gur sikh dheu hai |2|

Vaaran English.translation: The Guru and disciple have now attain the ratio of twenty and twenty One, i.e.the disciple has gone ahead of the Guru.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (9) gurdyau qy is`K dw vIh ivsvy (sMswr qoˆ auprwm hoky) iek eISÍr ivKy AiBAws hY[ (AQvw gur isK lyKy qoˆ pwr hn, ikauˆik bIs qk ihswb qy A`gy iekIh ihswboˆ pwr[ AglI pOVI ivKy iesy p`K nUM puSt krdy hn[ ies ivc Bwvyˆ d`isAw hY ik is`K sbd surq dw A`BÎws kr ky Aws

Vaaran English.translation: The disciple who obeys the commands of the Guru is called gurmukh.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurU dw cylw pRmwxIk gurmuK jwxIdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The actions of the gurmukh are awe-inspiring and their glory is indescribable.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (aus) gurmuK dy 'coj' (=kMm) Acrj rUp hn, (ausdI) Ak`Q khwxI hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Considering creation as the form of the Creator he feels to be a sacrifice unto it.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: kudrq' (eISÍr dI rcnW) Qoˆ kurbwx jweIey, (ausy Qoˆ kwdr) krqw (Anumwn pRmwn dÍwry) jwxIdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: In the world he feels himself as a guest and the world a guest house.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuK (AwpnUM) jgq ivKy pRwhuxw (smJdy hn), (Eh) jgq ivc pUjnIk huMdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Truth is his real Guru whom he speaks and listens to.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: siqgur nUM s`c suhwauˆdw hY (eyh gurmuK) kihMdy hn qy khwauˆdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Like a bard, at the doors of the holy congregation, he recites the hymns of the Guru (gurbani).

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (gurmuK) aunHW dy dr dw FwfI hoky, gurU dI bwxI boldw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: For him the holy congregation is the basis of his acquaintance with the omniscient Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (gurmuK) AMqrjwmI (Akwl purK) nUM dyKky (ausdy) ihq nUM pCwxdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: His consciousness remains absorbed in the graceful true Word.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: s`cy Sbd dw nISwn (imldw hY) surq (BgvMq pRIq) ivc smw jWdI hY[

Vaaran English.translation: True court of justice for him is the holy congregation and through Word the true identity of it he establishes in his heart.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (9) ie`ko (swD sMgq rUp) drvwjy (dI bwxI) dw Awsrw (r`Kky) Sbd duAwrw (bRhm nUM) isAwxdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: sbdu gurU gur vwhu; gurmuiK pwieAw [
lines.transliteration_english: sabadh guroo gur vaahu; guramukh paaeiaa |

Vaaran English.translation: From the Guru the disciple obtains the wondrous Word

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurU dw sbd gurU hY, (Aqy) DMn hY auh gurmuK (ijsny auh gurU) pwieAw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: And as a disciple, merging his consciousness in it, comes face to face with imperceptible Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: cyly (gurU AMgd ny sbd dI) surq ivKy (Awp) smwieky hornW nUM AlK (prmysr) lKw id`qw[

Vaaran English.translation: Meeting the Guru, the disciple attains turia, the fourth and final stage of spiritual quietude.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (jd) gurU (nwnk) nwl cyly dw 'vIvwh' (=myl) hoieAw (gurU ny) qurIAw pd (dI GoVI pur) cVHw id`qw[

Vaaran English.translation: He holds unfathomable and serene Lord dearly in his heart.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (Pl) gihr gMBIr AQwh hoky Ajr (nw jry jwx vwly pdwrQ) jr lIqy[

Vaaran English.translation: Becoming carefree that true disciple merges himself in the truth.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: s`cw byprvwh (hoky) s`c ivKy smw gey[

Vaaran English.translation: And by becoming the king of kings he makes others subservient to him.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: pwqSwhW dy pwqSwh (bRhmwidkW pr) hukm c`lx lg ipAw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Only he loves the divine will of the Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: byprvwh' (vwihgurU dI) drgwh dw Bwxw cMgw l`gw[

Vaaran English.translation: And only he has tasted the nectar in the form of praises of the Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: s`cI isPq dI slwh dw AMimRq (Awp pIqw qy hornW nUM) ipAwieAw[

Vaaran English.translation: Taking consciousness into the depth of Word he has shaped the unchiselled mind.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (9) sbd dI surq (Asgwh-) bwhlI dyky, (keI AGVW) mUrKW nUM (GVwieAw-) Su`D kr id`qw[

lines.gurmukhi: mul n imlY Amolu; n kImiq pweIAY [

Vaaran English.translation: The way of life of gurmukhs is invaluable;

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (gurmuK pMQ) Amlok hY, mu`l nhIˆ imldw, nw (ies dI) kImq pYˆdI hY[

lines.transliteration_english: paae taraajoo tol; na atul tulaae'eeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: It cannot be purchased; on weighing scale it cannot be weighed.

lines.gurmukhi: inj Gir qKqu Afolu; n foil folweIAY [
lines.transliteration_english: nij ghar takhat addol; na ddol ddolaae'eeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: Stabilizing in one’s own self and not getting frivolous in his way of life.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Awpxy Gr dy qKq pr Afol rihky folxI nwl nhIˆ foldw[

Vaaran English.translation: This way is distinct and does not become defiled even when joined with some one else.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuK pMQ inrml hY (iksy nwl) rlwE qW rldw nhIˆ hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Its story is indescribable.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: iesdI kQw kQI nhIˆ jWdI, nw bolI jWdI hY nw iesdw bol boilAw jwxw cwhIey[

Vaaran English.translation: This way transcends all ommissions and all anxieties.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ieh) sdw Bu`l qoˆ rihq hY, dwnw hY, iksy ZlqI ivc nhIˆ Bu`ldw[

Vaaran English.translation: Absorbed in equipoise this gurmukh-way of life gives balance to life.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (eyh) gurmuK pMQ siQr hY, (iesdI s`qw) sihj pd ivc hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The gurmukh quaffs from the tank of nectar.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: AMmRq dy srovr nUM Jol ky gurmuK (ieh sihj dI dwq) pwauˆdy hn[

lines.transliteration_english: lakh Tolee eik Tol; na aap gaNaae'eeaai |5|

Vaaran English.translation: The end result of lacs of experiences is the gurmukh never exhibits his ego.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (9) (ienHW pws) l`KW pdwrQW dw iek pdwrQ (ieh hY ik) Awpw nhIˆ gxwauˆdy[

Vaaran English.translation: From the shop of holy congregation, through the Word, the merchandise of God’s name is procured.

lines.transliteration_english: pooraa poore vaT; k aakh salaaheeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: How to praise Him? The measuring criteria of the perfect Lord are perfect.

Vaaran English.translation: The warehouse of the True King is never deficient.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: kdy bI G`t nhIˆ hoaU (ikauˆik) s`cy dI pwqSwhI dw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Cultivating the True Guru, those who earn through Him get merged into His inexhaustible Being.

Vaaran English.translation: The company of the saints is manifestly great; one should always be in and with it.

lines.gurmukhi: cwvil iekqy sit; n dUjI vwhIAY [
lines.transliteration_english: chaaval eikate saT; na dhoojee vaaheeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: Husk in the form of maya should be separated from the rice of life

Vaaran English.translation: with strokes of discipline during this very life.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: r`b dI dwq pwky jm hI PwhI nUM k`t is`tIey[

Vaaran English.translation: All the five evil propensities, should be decimated.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: pMjW hI dUqW nUM Gyrky (aunHW dI) FyrI Fwh dyeIey[

Vaaran English.translation: As the water of well keeps the fields green, the field of the consciousness should be kept verdant (with the help of shabad).

Vaaran English.translation: Lord Himself is the true Guru who is imperceptible.

Vaaran English.translation: Of His own will He Establishes or uproots.

lines.gurmukhi: lypu n puMin n pwip; aupwie smwveI [

Vaaran English.translation: The sin and virtue of creation and destruction do not touch Him at all.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: aupwaux qy smwaux kr ky (ausnUM) pwpw puMn dw lyp nhIˆ hY[

lines.gurmukhi: lwgU vru n srwp; n Awp jxwveI [
lines.transliteration_english: laagoo var na saraap; na aap jaNaave'ee |

Vaaran English.translation: He never makes anybody notice Him and boons and curses do not stick to Him.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: nw Awp nUM jxwauˆdw hY nw vr srwp dw lwgU bxdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The true Guru recites the Word and unfolds the grandeur of that indescribable Lord.

Vaaran English.translation: Eulogosong the ineffable (Lord) he does not indulge in hypocrisy and guile.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Ak`Q kQw krdw (Awqm aupdyS dyˆdw), jwp jpdy hoey jgq (dI kwr rwg dÍYK dI) nhIˆ krdw[

Vaaran English.translation: The effulgence of the perfect Guru finishes off the ego of the seekers of knowledge.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (AYsy) pUry gurU dy pRqwp nwl (jgÎwsUAW dw) Awpw Bwv guAwcdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The Guru effacing the three suferings (god-sent, physical and spiritual) lessens the anxieties of the people.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ieh pRqwp) iqMny qwp auqwrdw qy sMqwp dUr krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: gurbwxI mn DRwip; inj Gir AwveI [7[
lines.transliteration_english: gurabaaNee man dhraap; nij ghar aave'ee |7|

Vaaran English.translation: Getting satiated by the teachings of such a Guru, the individual stays in his innate nature.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (9) (AYsy) gurU dI bwxI nwl mn itkdw qy (jgÎwsU) Awpxy srUp ivc Aw jWdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The perfect Guru is truth incarnate who is realised by becoming gurmukh.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: pUrw siqgurU siq (srUp) hY, gurmuK (hoky ausdI) Bwl krIey[

Vaaran English.translation: The desire of the true Guru is that the Word should be sustained;

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (aus) siqgur dI pUrImiq (ieh hY ik sdw) sbd dI sMBwl krIey[

Vaaran English.translation: Burning the ego one will get honour in the court of Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (Aqy) haumY nUM swVky drgwh leI AwpxI pq Do lvIey (iks qrHW?)

lines.gurmukhi: Gr hI jog jugiq; bYsx DrmswlIAY [
lines.transliteration_english: ghar hee jog jugat; baisaN dharamasaaleeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: One should learn the technique of merging in the Lord by considering one’s home as the place for cultivating dharma.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Gr ivc hI (vwihgurU nwl) juV jwx dI jugq Drmswl (siqsMg) ivc bYTky is`K lvIey[

lines.gurmukhi: pwvx moK mukiq; gur isK pwlIAY [
lines.transliteration_english: paavaN mokh mukat; gur sikh paaleeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: Liberation for them is certain who abide by the teaching of the Guru.

Vaaran English.translation: They having loving devotion in their heart remain jubliant.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (aunHW dy) AMdr pRymw BgqI huMdI hY, (aunHW pr vwihgurU dI) myhr dI nzr huMdI hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Such people are emperors full of delight.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: iek Cq(=iek C`qR vwlI suqMqR) pwqSwhI (ienHW nUM) KrI suK`lI pRwpq ho jWdI hY (XQw-rwjw sglI isRsit kw hir nwim mnu iBMnw)[

Vaaran English.translation: Becoming egoless they serve the sangat, congregation, by bringing water, grinding corn etc. for it.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (pwqSwh hoky Pyr) pwxI (Fox, c`kI dw) pIhxw pwauˆdy qy (hor) syvw Gwldy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: In humility and joy they lead altogether distinct life.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (9) inrwlI cwl (ieh hY) ik ZrIbI ivc iPrdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: The Guru preaches to the Sikh to be pure in conduct.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuKW dw (ijnHW nUM) gurU dw aupdyS imilAw hY, scw lyK (ieh hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: He (gurmukh) joining the congregation remains absorbed in the Word.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: siqsMg nwl (aunHW ny) myl (kIqw qy) sbd ivKy Gr kIqw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: In the company of flowers the sesame oil also becomes scented.

lines.gurmukhi: gur isK nk nkyl; imtY AMdyisAw [

Vaaran English.translation: Nose – string of God’s Will remains in the nose of the Sikh of the Guru i.e. he always keeps himself ready to be subservient to the Lord.

Vaaran English.translation: Taking bath in the ambrosial hours he remains enrapt in the region of the Lord.

Vaaran English.translation: Remembering Guru in his heart he becomes one with Him.

Vaaran English.translation: This way he becomes dervish at the door of the Lord and gets drenched in the delights of the rains of love.

Vaaran English.translation: He will be seen as the first moon of Id day (which the Muslims eagerly wait for in order to break their long fasts), and only he will come out as a perfect man.

lines.gurmukhi: gur mUriq musqwku; mir mir jIvxw [

Vaaran English.translation: Becoming an avid suiter of the form (word) of the Guru and being dead to greed, infatuation and other relational propensities, he should remain alive in the world.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurU mUrq dw muSqwk (=AwiSk jW pRymI) rhy, (rb dy pwisEˆ) moieAw (hoieAw) jIvy (qy sMswr vloˆ) mry[

Vaaran English.translation: Seeking no shelter elsewhere he should keep his mind absorbed in the shelterof God, the Guru.

Vaaran English.translation: Sacred is the cup of the love of the beloved; he should quaff that only.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: iprI dy ipAwly dy piv`qR AMimRq rs nUM pwn kro[

Vaaran English.translation: Making humility his abode he should get poised in it.

Vaaran English.translation: Divorcing the (tastes of ) ten organs i.e.not being caught in their dragnet, he should attain equipose.

Vaaran English.translation: Absorption of consciousness in the Word makes him alert and this way one gets across the Word – ocean.
